meanings.sent1: Yesterday, my dog craped on the carpet.
meanings.sent2: The baby craped in his diaper during nap time.
meanings.sent3: I hope the birds don't crap on my car again.
meanings.sent4: The seagulls craped all over the pier, making a mess.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly craped soil filled the air in the garden.

meanings.definition: Covered with a thin layer of something.
meanings.sent1: The car was craped with a layer of dust from the desert.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes were craped with mud after the hike.
meanings.sent3: The cake was craped with a thin layer of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The old book was craped with a layer of dust, showing its age.
meanings.sent5: The window was craped with a thin layer of frost on the cold morning.

meanings.definition: To create a design on a surface by scraping it.
meanings.sent1: She craped her initials into the tree trunk with a knife.
meanings.sent2: The artist craped a beautiful pattern onto the pottery.
meanings.sent3: He craped a smiley face into the foggy mirror after his shower.
meanings.sent4: The child craped a heart into the sand at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti artist craped intricate designs onto the brick wall.
